import React from 'react' function NavBar(props) { const CountryDropdown = (props) => { const changeCountry = (event, countryCode) => { event.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default action of the link props.setCountry(countryCode); }}; return (
Navbar
  • Home
  • Country
    • changeCountry(event, 'IN')}>India
    • changeCountry(event, 'US')}>America
    • changeCountry(event, 'CA')}>Canada
) } export default NavBar
